simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This command executes given expression(s) as a system command and returns the exit code.

example.title: Count words in "hallo wold" string, then print name of your machine's operating system.
example.programlisting: exec echo hallo world; # prints hallo world exec "echo hallo word" | wc; # counts words in hallo world exec uname; # prints operating system name
